verbs.description: hartford fixes [V: blighted] [ARG1: properties] in revitalization push hartford officials have fixed more than 140 blighted properties as part of an effort to clean up the city and increase tax revenue the hartford courant reports that mayor luke bronin said the city on pace to address at least 100 cases of blight annually during a town hall meet hartford
